title: Bare cupboard chicken pasta bake
ingredients: ['4 skinless chicken breast fillets', '180g medium egg noodles', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '250ml soured cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '110g butter', '60g crumbled buttery round crackers, such as Ritz']
